title: Strengthening Business Strategy Competencies: Mobile-Based Gain Instructional Design Model for Health Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational medical knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform five core health procedures (e.g., first aid, infection control) with 90% accuracy via mobile modules.
Learners can remember and utilize mobile content designed according to the nine stages of the Gagné model (e.g., gaining attention, presenting objectives) at over 80% retention after two months.
Learners can achieve a course satisfaction rating of 4.5/5 or higher in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
